context: Could you recommend any books similar to The Lovely Bones?
The Lovely Bones was written by Alice Sebold. Similar books written by her are Lucky and The Almost Moon. If you are into Novels, you can read The Rainbow.
Sounds interesting. Who wrote the Rainbow?
I don't have that information. Anything else you want to know?
What genre is The Almost Moon?
resp: The Almost Moon is a fiction. Similar books are Wuthering Heights and World Without End.
